h2_title: Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: Another cheekier way to evade this attack is to simply find some high ground. There are a few raised rocks in the arena — some that he may destroy over time — but can be used to get off the floor where the electric rings travel. There’s one large rock as you first enter the arena, two more near the back on either side of the stairs, and one more opposite the stairs in the far corner.

The content is as follows:
Another cheekier way to evade this attack is to simply find some high ground. There are a few raised rocks in the arena — some that he may destroy over time — but can be used to get off the floor where the electric rings travel. There’s one large rock as you first enter the arena, two more near the back on either side of the stairs, and one more opposite the stairs in the far corner.
